Articles.Content: Anybody know of any "Megacheat" mods? By that, I mean mods that make KSP incredibly easy. Like mods that remove gravity from Kerbin or allow teleporting or maybe an infinite fuel mod. I never got into mods much. I use Mechjeb to get information about the rockets I make and very rarely use autopilot unless the ship is nigh impossible to control. I was just wondering what some of these mods were called.

Low Grav and Infinite Fuel are stock, alt+F12, make sure you're on the cheat tab (you will be to start with), infinite fuel is three groups and hack gravity is a button (cannot directly be reverted and the trajectory estimate on the map screen will be wrong)

Teleporting/world modification, HyperEdit, http://www.kerbaltekaerospace.com/
Thanks. I knew what some did, just not what they were called.
